title: WTB: The last few t206 HOF and SL for my set
author: Danny Smith

posts.post_title: WTB: The last few t206 HOF and SL for my set
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following in low grade PSA or Raw (preferred). No SGC please.

Jimmy Collins
Sam Crawford Throwing
Hugh Duffy
Ed Foster
James Lafitte
John McGraw Glove at Hip
George Paige
Tony Thebo
Joe Tinker Bat On
